price: Sie sagten: Was soll dann die Vergeltung dafür sein, wenn ihr Lügner seid?
arabic: قَالُواْ فَمَا جَزَٰٓؤُهُۥٓ إِن كُنتُمۡ كَٰذِبِينَ

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: qālū famā jazāuhu in kuntum kādhibīna
